title: LF Top and Support for Melbourne Team
body:
PLEASE NOTE BEFORE READING, IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO ATTEND MELBOURNE BASED LANS THIS ISN'T FOR YOU

Hello friends, DynastyLoL are currently looking for a LAN based Support and Top Laner of ATLEAST Gold 3 in Rank.

- Requirements -


Good Attitude This includes Minimum to no BM (Bad Manners) during both Online and Offline games. As well as keeping a high morale during games. and ZERO rage.

Communication Communication is vital in a team environment so we prefer you to be VERY vocal. Must also be able to download and use TeamsSpeak3

Age We require you to be atleast 17 years of age as that's the minimum age required to play in official Riot Tournaments.


- Template -


IGN:
AGE:
LOCATION:
CHAMP POOL:
STRENGTHS:
WEAKNESS:
OTHER INFO:



Reply either below, Via PM or add me in game 

Cheers for reading.



Proudly Supported By:

Streamline
www.streamline-servers.com/
https://www.facebook.com/StreamlineServers


Bump us a like on our Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Dynastyorg

replies.body: I'm bronze 5 but I'm secretly challenjur shud hire me/10 ign

Currently am bronze 3 player but have been through the ranks to silver and almost gold in pre season. Have been very experienced and work well with teams that are willing to help. First ranked team i joined i was the jungler (rammus) and set up easy kills. We lost because of a disconnect. From then on ranked team just split. Similar things have happened to me and im looking for a team that will actually work. If this is it i will be glad to join.I have played since late season 2 on and off and have had a lot of experience with "impossible games" and have been able to bring them backing by having a positive attitude and trying. On oce server under name thetrollmast3r. And don't worry, I only troll the enemy team.

 Also live in melbourne btw so it meet da requirements
IGN:thetrollmast3r
AGE:16
LOCATION:Melbourne
CHAMP POOL:Lots i guess?
STRENGTHS:Jungler, having team that i can tank for so they can do damage
WEAKNESS:charging in to team fights and then finding out team did not engage as well.
OTHER INFO:Homura Akemi ign/10 has to be 7/10 for anime reference hp regen master ign/10 is8/10 beats you cause of good thinking not a rip off. 
Praise Ennio Morricone!

because you want people in melborne  only and all these special requirements, your results will be slim to none, im keen to join a team but you know im not melborne. Message me if you change your mind cause i doubt doing it this way you will find people. Especially when its mostly skype or team speak these days. Good luck. And im bronze but ranks only matter to a point. To think otherwise is ignorant.

rank matter to a point in master tier.
